ps2.1:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
ps2.1:1.3: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi—
ps2.1:1.5: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṃ.
ps2.1:2.1: “Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattaṃ byākaroti, sabbaso catūhi maggehi etesaṃ vā aññatarena.
ps2.1:3.2: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
ps2.1:3.3: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:3.4: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāveti.
ps2.1:4.2: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
ps2.1:4.3: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:4.4: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti.
ps2.1:5.2: Tassa samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
ps2.1:5.3: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:5.4: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti;
ps2.1:6.2: hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:6.4: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps2.1:6.5: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:7.1: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattaṃ byākaroti, sabbaso imehi catūhi maggehi, etesaṃ vā aññatarenā”ti.
ps2.1:8.3: Tattha jāte dhamme aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, dukkhato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, anattato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā.
ps2.1:8.8: tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, āsevanaṭṭhena bhāvanā.
ps2.1:9.2: Dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi maggo sañjāyati, abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo maggo sañjāyati, pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācā maggo sañjāyati, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammanto maggo sañjāyati, vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvo maggo sañjāyati, paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmo maggo sañjāyati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati maggo sañjāyati, avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi maggo sañjāyati—
ps2.1:10.1: **So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti āsevatī**ti kathaṃ āsevati?
ps2.1:10.2: Āvajjanto āsevati, jānanto āsevati, passanto āsevati, paccavekkhanto āsevati, cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto āsevati, saddhāya adhimuccanto āsevati, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto āsevati, satiṃ upaṭṭhāpento āsevati, cittaṃ samādahanto āsevati, paññāya pajānanto āsevati, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto āsevati, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto āsevati, pahātabbaṃ pajahanto āsevati, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento āsevati, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto āsevati—
ps2.1:11.2: Āvajjanto bhāveti, jānanto bhāveti, passanto bhāveti, paccavekkhanto bhāveti, cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto bhāveti, saddhāya adhimuccanto bhāveti, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto bhāveti, satiṃ upaṭṭhāpento bhāveti, cittaṃ samādahanto bhāveti, paññāya pajānanto bhāveti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto bhāveti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto bhāveti, pahātabbaṃ pajahanto bhāveti, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento bhāveti, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto bhāveti—
ps2.1:12.2: Āvajjanto bahulīkaroti, jānanto bahulīkaroti, passanto bahulīkaroti, paccavekkhanto bahulīkaroti, cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto bahulīkaroti, saddhāya adhimuccanto bahulīkaroti, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto bahulīkaroti, satiṃ upaṭṭhāpento bahulīkaroti, cittaṃ samādahanto bahulīkaroti, paññāya pajānanto bahulīkaroti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto bahulīkaroti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto bahulīkaroti, pahātabbaṃ pajahanto bahulīkaroti, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento bahulīkaroti, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto bahulīkaroti—
ps2.1:13.1: **Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti anusayā byantīhontī**ti kathaṃ saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti?
ps2.1:13.14: Arahattamaggena rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṃ, avijjā—
ps2.1:14.3: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps2.1:14.4: Tattha jāte dhamme aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, dukkhato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, anattato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā.
ps2.1:14.9: tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, āsevanaṭṭhena bhāvanā.
ps2.1:15.2: Dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi maggo sañjāyati, abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo maggo sañjāyati …pe…
ps2.1:16.1: **So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti āsevatī**ti kathaṃ āsevati?
ps2.1:17.1: **Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhontī**ti kathaṃ saññojanā pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti?
ps2.1:17.14: Arahattamaggena rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṃ, avijjā—
ps2.1:18.2: Aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, dukkhato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, anattato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā.
ps2.1:18.3: Tattha jātānaṃ dhammānañca vosaggārammaṇatā cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo.
ps2.1:18.4: Samādhi iti paṭhamaṃ vipassanā, pacchā samatho.
ps2.1:19.1: Rūpaṃ aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, rūpaṃ dukkhato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, rūpaṃ anattato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā.
ps2.1:19.2: Tattha jātānaṃ dhammānañca vosaggārammaṇatā cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps2.1:20.6: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā, jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhato …pe…
ps2.1:20.8: Tattha jātānaṃ dhammānañca vosaggārammaṇatā cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps2.1:21.3: Ārammaṇaṭṭhena gocaraṭṭhena pahānaṭṭhena pariccāgaṭṭhena vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena vivaṭṭanaṭṭhena santaṭṭhena paṇītaṭṭhena vimuttaṭṭhena anāsavaṭṭhena taraṇaṭṭhena animittaṭṭhena appaṇihitaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena ekarasaṭṭhena anativattanaṭṭhena yuganaddhaṭṭhena.
ps2.1:22.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhārammaṇo, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhārammaṇā.
ps2.1:22.3: Iti ārammaṇaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:23.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:23.3: Iti gocaraṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:24.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:24.3: Iti pahānaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:25.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pariccajato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pariccajato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:25.3: Iti pariccāgaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:26.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:26.3: Iti vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:27.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vivaṭṭato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vivaṭṭato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:27.3: Iti vivaṭṭanaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:28.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi santo honti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā santā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:28.3: Iti santaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:29.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi paṇīto hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā paṇītā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:29.3: Iti paṇītaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:30.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi kāmāsavā vimutto hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā avijjāsavā vimuttā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:30.3: Iti rāgavirāgā cetovimutti avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti vimuttaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:31.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi kāmāsavena anāsavo hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā avijjāsavena anāsavā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:31.3: Iti anāsavaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:32.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca tarato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca tarato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:32.3: Iti taraṇaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:33.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi sabbanimittehi animitto hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā sabbanimittehi animittā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:33.3: Iti animittaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:34.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi sabbapaṇidhīhi appaṇihito hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā sabbapaṇidhīhi appaṇihitā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:34.3: Iti appaṇihitaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:35.2: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi sabbābhinivesehi suñño hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjaṃ pajahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā sabbābhinivesehi suññā hoti nirodhagocarā.
ps2.1:35.3: Iti suññataṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti.
ps2.1:35.12: Imehi soḷasahi ākārehi samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti, evaṃ samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti. (14)
ps2.1:36.2: Aniccato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati, obhāso dhammoti obhāsaṃ āvajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ.
ps2.1:36.3: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, dukkhato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
ps2.1:36.5: “dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānaso hoti so samayo, yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:36.7: evaṃ maggo sañjāyati, evaṃ saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:37.1: Aniccato manasikaroto ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, pīti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukhaṃ uppajjati, adhimokkho uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upaṭṭhānaṃ uppajjati, upekkhā uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati, “nikanti dhammo”ti nikantiṃ āvajjati.
ps2.1:37.3: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, dukkhato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
ps2.1:37.5: “dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānaso hoti so samayo, yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:37.8: evaṃ maggo sañjāyati, evaṃ saññojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
ps2.1:38.2: anattato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati …pe… ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, pīti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukhaṃ uppajjati, adhimokkho uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upaṭṭhānaṃ uppajjati, upekkhā uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati, “nikanti dhammo”ti nikantiṃ āvajjati.
ps2.1:38.4: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ, aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ, dukkhato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
ps2.1:39.10: jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhato manasikaroto, jarāmaraṇaṃ anattato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati …pe… ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, pīti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukhaṃ uppajjati, adhimokkho uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upaṭṭhānaṃ uppajjati, upekkhā uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati, “nikanti dhammo”ti nikantiṃ āvajjati.
ps2.1:39.14: Jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
ps2.1:39.17: So samayo, yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
ps2.1:44.3: Na ca vikkhipate cittaṃ na kilissati,
ps2.1:45.1: Imehi catūhi ṭhānehi cittassa saṅkhepavikkhepaviggahitaṃ dasa ṭhāne sampajānātīti.
